title: DeepMPR: Enhancing Opportunistic Routing in Wireless Networks through Multi-Agent Deep Reinforcement Learning. (arXiv:2306.09637v1 [cs.NI])
abstract: Opportunistic routing relies on the broadcast capability of wireless networks. It brings higher reliability and robustness in highly dynamic and/or severe environments such as mobile or vehicular ad-hoc networks (MANETs/VANETs). To reduce the cost of broadcast, multicast routing schemes use the connected dominating set (CDS) or multi-point relaying (MPR) set to decrease the network overhead and hence, their selection algorithms are critical. Common MPR selection algorithms are heuristic, rely on coordination between nodes, need high computational power for large networks, and are difficult to tune for network uncertainties. In this paper, we use multi-agent deep reinforcement learning to design a novel MPR multicast routing technique, DeepMPR, which is outperforming the OLSR MPR selection algorithm while it does not require MPR announcement messages from the neighbors. translated_abstract: 机会路由依赖于无线网络的广播能力，在高度动态和/或恶劣环境下（如移动或车载自组织网络(MANETs/VANETs)）带来更高的可靠性和鲁棒性。为了减少广播成本，组播路由方案使用连接支配集(CDS)或多点中继(MPR)集来减少网络开销，因此，它们的选择算法至关重要。常见的MPR选择算法是启发式的，依赖于节点之间的协调，在大型网络中需要高计算功率，并且很难对网络不确定性进行调整。本文使用多智能体深度强化学习来设计一种新的MPR组播路由技术，DeepMPR，其表现优于OLSFR MPR选择算法，同时不需要邻居的MPR公告消息。我们的评估结果证明了我们训练的DeepMPR组播转发策略相对于OLSFR MPR选择算法的性能提升。
tldr: 本文引入了DeepMPR，一种使用多智能体深度强化学习来设计的MPR组播路由技术。该技术不仅表现更佳，而且不需要邻居的MPR公告消息。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces DeepMPR, an MPR multicast routing technique designed using multi-agent deep reinforcement learning. The technique not only outperforms existing algorithms but also does not require MPR announcement messages from neighbors.
